entries.title: Extremely drug-resistant germ found in eye drops infects 55 in 12 states; 1 dead
entries.description: CDC urges people to stop using EzriCare-branded artificial tears.

entries.title: After 16 years of freeware, Dwarf Fortress creators get their $7M payday
entries.description: "When we pass from this world, you will be the reason we are remembered."

entries.title: Squid skin inspires novel “liquid windows” for greater energy savings
entries.description: Bio-inspired system optimizes wavelength, intensity, dispersion of light reaching interiors.

entries.title: Razer’s $280 mouse is covered in gaping holes
entries.description: With a magnesium-alloy exoskeleton, the Viper Mini SE weighs 1.73 ounces.

entries.title: ISP admits lying to FCC about size of network to block funding to rivals
entries.description: ISP gave FCC false coverage information to prevent others from getting grants.

entries.title: Anker’s Eufy admits unencrypted videos could be accessed, plans overhaul
entries.description: Company says it will push updates, hire experts, and start a bounty program.

entries.title: Carbon capture is here—it just isn’t evenly distributed
entries.description: Small installations like CarbonQuest's may provide a key demonstration of the tech.

entries.title: Cash-strapped Twitter to start charging developers for API access next week
entries.description: Twitter cutting off free access to its API will block research, kill fun bots.

entries.title: PS5 owners won’t get this set of free PS4 games for much longer
entries.description: Plus subscribers have until May to claim their 19 free downloads.

entries.title: Enter the hunter satellites preparing for space war
entries.description: Startup plans to launch prototype pursuit satellites on a SpaceX flight later this year.

entries.title: Six new electric Volvos will debut by 2026
entries.description: The brand is preparing EV sedans and SUVs, and for China, a van.
